participant_1.background:
I eat a strictly vegan diet.
My friends tell me that i am a neurotic hypochondriac.
Ocd rules my life , and i have a hard time relinquishing control.
I teach elementary school children at a private school.

participant_2.background:
I visit comic con.
I love anime.
I read a lot.
I draw comics.
I love role play.

content.text: Hello!
Hey there!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, draw, and go to comic cons!
That sounds like fun! I used to read a lot when I was younger, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
It's never too late to start reading again! There are so many great books out there, you're sure to find something you'll love.
I know, I know. I've been meaning to pick up a new book for a while now. I just need to find the time.
I have a suggestion! You should check out the bookstore on the corner. They have a great selection of books, and they're always having sales.
That's a great idea! I'll definitely check it out. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to help people find books they'll love.
So, what kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I'm mostly into fantasy and science fiction. I also love graphic novels and manga.
I've never read a graphic novel or manga before. What are they like?
Graphic novels are like comic books, but they're usually longer and more complex. Manga is a type of Japanese comic book that's often serialized.
That sounds interesting. I might have to check them out sometime.
I highly recommend it!
So, what do you like about comic cons?
I love the atmosphere! It's so much fun to be around people who are passionate about the same things you are. I also love seeing all the costumes and artwork.
I can imagine! I've always wanted to go to a comic con, but I've never had the time.
You should definitely go to one sometime! They're so much fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
